def count(a, t, x):
    return sum(not (t-v)%x if x else t==v for v in a)

def count(a, t, y):
  return sum(not (x-t) % y if y else x == t for x in a)
count=lambda a,t,x:sum(x and not(e-t)%x or e-t==0for e in a)

def count(a, t, x):
    return sum((t-i)%x==0 for i in a) if x else sum(i==t for i in a)

def count(A, t, x):
    return sum(a%x==t%x for a in A) if x else sum(a==t for a in A)

def count(a, t, x):
    return sum(1 for n in a if (n % x == t % x if x else n == t))
count=lambda a,t,x:sum((e-t)%x==0if x!=0else e-t==0for e in a)
